title: Eat 1 Spoon 3 Times Per Day And Improve Your Blood Results!
directions: Cut the two lemons in half and remove the seeds, then ground them with or without the rind (depending on whether they are sprayed or not). Then, add honey, beetroot juice and carrot juice and mix altogether. In the end, add chopped or ground walnuts and raisins. You will get around 1 kilogram of healing mixture which you can keep in a jar.
